backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing site settings with admin‑gated updates and link addition for header, footer, and social media.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage hero-image update feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, styles, and config files.
frontend/index.html: Main ICP app HTML entry loading the React application via main.tsx with favicon.
frontend/nonicp.html: Static non‑ICP HTML entry loading the alternate React build via nonicp/main.jsx.
frontend/public/data/events.v1.json: Static JSON listing events with metadata like dates, locations, and publication timestamps.
frontend/public/data/impact-stories.v1.j: Static JSON dataset of published impact stories with titles, text, and optional images.
frontend/public/data/programs.v1.json: Static JSON program catalog including objectives, outcomes, categories, and optional images.
frontend/public/data/team.v1.json: Static JSON describing team members with roles, bios, visibility, and display order.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router and global error boundary defining all public, admin, and control panel routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Admin panel layout managing auth checks, admin access control, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Modal for login and signup handling form state, validation, and simulated auth actions.
frontend/src/components/control/ControlL: Admin control panel layout handling auth checks, sidebar navigation, and logout flow.
frontend/src/components/control/Standalo: Standalone variant of the control panel layout with similar auth checks and navigation, using direct URL redirects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying logo, navigation links, social links, and decorative styling elements.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, scroll effects, Internet Identity integration, and auth modal triggers.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper with error boundaries, safe rendering wrappers, header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/constants/logo.js: Exports canonical logo path and alt text for non-TS modules.
frontend/src/constants/logo.ts: Exports canonical logo path and alt text for TypeScript modules.
frontend/src/ControlApp.tsx: Standalone control‑panel React router configuring routes for dashboard, settings, and content management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Determines whether the authenticated user has admin privileges by querying their role from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides admin CRUD query and mutation hooks for programs and other backend-managed entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRoleManagemen: Provides mutations for admin role operations like registering emails and granting admin rights, invalidating related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication lifecycle, exposing identity state, login, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for fetching programs, team members, stories, events, and other backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Defines React Query hooks and mutations for retrieving and updating site settings, including header, footer, and social links.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and declares extensive light and dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and mounts the main App component.
frontend/src/nonicp/App.jsx: Sets up the non-ICP app’s router, pages, auth provider, theme provider, and query client configuration.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/AuthProvider.js: Implements an authentication context that manages user sessions, registration, login, and logout via a local store.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/authStore.js: LocalStorage-backed auth store providing user registration, sign-in, session persistence, and validation utilities.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/RequireAuth.jsx: Guards protected routes by checking auth state and redirecting unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/useAuth.js: Exposes a hook to access authentication context values within the AuthProvider scope.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpFoo: React footer component with quick links, social links, branding, and styled layout elements.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpHea: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, scroll-based styling, and mobile menu using Sheet.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpLay: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/staticDataClien: Client-side JSON fetcher with caching for programs, events, team members, and impact stories.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/submissionsStor: LocalStorage-backed storage for saving and retrieving donation and contact form submissions.
frontend/src/nonicp/main.jsx: Application entry point rendering the main App component into the root element.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/AboutPage.jsx: About page that loads team members and impact stories, displaying mission, values, and animated sections.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ContactPage.js: Contact page with contact info, social links, and a form that saves submissions to localStorage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/DonatePage.jsx: Donation page with preset and custom amounts, impact areas, and a form that stores donation submissions.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/EventsPage.jsx: Loads events from static data, applies filtering and sorting, and displays them with UI components and loading states.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/GalleryPage.js: Renders a filterable image gallery with scroll-triggered animations and modal image viewing.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/HomePage.jsx: Implements the homepage with animated hero, parallax effects, feature sections, and impact images.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/LoginPage.jsx: Provides a login form with validation, error handling, and redirect logic using the app’s auth system.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/NotFoundPage.j: Displays a styled 404 error page with a link back to the homepage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ProgramsPage.j: Fetches and displays programs with category filtering, animations, and loading states using tab-based navigation.
Protected user page showing profile info, authentication features, and logout/home navigation.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/SignupPage.jsx: Signup form with validation, error handling, and redirect logic for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying mission, values, impact stories, and team members with scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContacts.t: Admin interface for viewing, marking, and deleting contact form submissions with summaries and table-based management.
Admin dashboard displaying stats, contact messages, and a form to grant admin rights by email and principal ID.
Page listing all donations with totals, averages, and a detailed table view.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEvents.tsx: Admin interface to create, edit, delete, and filter events with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminImpactStor: Page for managing impact stories including add, edit, delete, publish toggling, and image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login workflow handling Internet Identity login, email registration, association, and admin role granting.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPrograms.t: Admin UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting programs with image upload and form management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTeam.tsx: Admin interface to manage team members, including CRUD actions, visibility settings, and photo uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with contact info, social links, and a validated message submission form.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlDashbo: Dashboard showing summarized site statistics with cards linking to management sections.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlEvents: Events management panel supporting search, filtering, and full CRUD with optional image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlGaller: Gallery admin view handling image uploads with progress, item editing, ordering, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlImpact: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting impact stories with image upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlProgra: Admin interface to manage programs, including CRUD operations, image uploads, and handling objectives and outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlSiteSe: Page for editing site-wide settings such as links, slogans, social media, and footer content.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlTeam.t: Admin page to manage team members with fields for name, role, bio, order, visibility, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/StandaloneCon: Dashboard displaying admin statistics and navigation cards for managing site content.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donation page offering preset or custom amounts, impact descriptions, and a form to submit donations.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays events fetched from the API with filtering by status and animated UI sections for browsing and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of images with category filtering, scroll-triggered animations, and modal image previews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero animations, parallax effects, feature highlights, statistics, and impact visuals.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Lists educational programs with category tabs, animated sections, and loading skeletons while fetching program data.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Utility functions to normalize and detect authorization-related errors based on backend messages.
frontend/STATIC_HOSTING.md: Guide explaining ICP vs static hosting modes and their entry points and capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, shadows, radii, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for replacing Home page hero images, including schema version, feature metadata, and pending request AR-1.
